LanguageData.HSK_Wild.degreeDatas.0.label: wild
LanguageData.HSK_Wild.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a special connection with nature. Somehow, {PAWN_pronoun} feels much better being in the wild, among the singing of birds and the rustle of trees. Perhaps because of that, {PAWN_nameDef} has a special talent for working with plants. Also, this feature is a reason {PAWN_pronoun} is bad in communication with others.
LanguageData.HSK_Oakman.degreeDatas.0.label: oaky
LanguageData.HSK_Oakman.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has received a special nickname for {PAWN_possessive} passion for woodworking and good-natured, calm character. The surrounding people condescendingly call {PAWN_objective} oaky, emphasizing such features as endurance, strength and studiousness. {PAWN_nameDef} sleeps quickly and tolerates pain easily. But when {PAWN_pronoun} make mistakes, surrounding people calling {PAWN_objective} clubhead for especially straightforward behavior, narrow-mindedness, sluggishness and difficulty in learning.
